perk.perks.economy.description.1: Reduces Perk usage costs by 10 percent.
perk.perks.economy.description.2: Reduces Perk usage costs by 15 percent.
perk.perks.economy.description.3: Reduces Perk usage costs by 20 percent.
perk.perks.intelligence.description.1: Reduces Perk learning costs by 5 percent.
perk.perks.intelligence.description.2: Reduces Perk learning costs by 10 percent.
perk.perks.intelligence.description.3: Reduces Perk learning costs by 15 percent.
perk.perks.iron_fist.description.1: Your fist breaks the block like a shovel.
perk.perks.iron_fist.description.2: Your fist breaks the block like a axe.
perk.perks.iron_fist.description.3: Your fist breaks the block like a sword.
perk.perks.iron_fist.description.4: Your fist breaks the block like a pickaxe.
perk.perks.cultivator.description.1: If you have a hoe in your hand, you will cultivate the land automatically.
perk.perks.cultivator.description.2: If you have a hoe in your hand, you will cultivate the 3x3 lands automatically.
perk.perks.cultivator.description.3: If you have a hoe in your hand, you will cultivate the 5x5 lands automatically.
perk.perks.seeder.description.1: If you have seeds or crops in your hands that you can plant, except pumpkins and watermelons, you can plant them automatically on the farmland.
perk.perks.seeder.description.2: If you have seeds or crops in your hands that you can plant, except pumpkins and watermelons, you can plant them automatically on the 3x3 farmlands.
perk.perks.seeder.description.3: If you have seeds or crops in your hands that you can plant, except pumpkins and watermelons, you can plant them automatically on the 5x5 farmlands.
perk.perks.spreader.description.1: If you have bone meal in your hand, it will be automatically used for crop.
perk.perks.spreader.description.2: If you have bone meal in your hand, it will be automatically used for 3x3 crops.
perk.perks.spreader.description.3: If you have bone meal in your hand, it will be automatically used for 5x5 crops.
perk.perks.harvester.description.1: If harvestable crops except pumpkin and watermelon are with, they are automatically harvested.
perk.perks.harvester.description.2: If harvestable crops except pumpkin and watermelon are within the 3x3 range, they are automatically harvested.
perk.perks.harvester.description.3: If harvestable crops except pumpkin and watermelon are within the 3x3 range, they are automatically harvested.
perk.perks.furnaceman.description.1: Refining speed is doubled when you are around Furnace.
perk.perks.furnaceman.description.2: Refining speed is tripled when you are around Furnace.
perk.perks.furnaceman.description.3: Refining speed is quadrupled when you are around Furnace.
perk.perks.resident_of_end.description.1: Disable teleport when eating chorus fruit.
perk.perks.resident_of_end.description.2: Disable endermite spawning when using ender pearl.
perk.perks.resident_of_end.description.3: Disable damage when using ender pearl.
perk.perks.breeder.description.1: If you have animal feed in your hand, it will automatically breeding the grow-up animals within the 3x3 range.
perk.perks.breeder.description.2: If you have animal feed in your hand, it will automatically breeding the grow-up animals within the 5x5 range.
perk.perks.breeder.description.3: If you have animal feed in your hand, it will automatically breeding the grow-up animals within the 7x7 range.
perk.perks.feeder.description.1: If you have animal feed in your hand, it will automatically feeding the child animals that are within the 3x3 range.
perk.perks.feeder.description.2: If you have animal feed in your hand, it will automatically feeding the child animals that are within the 5x5 range.
perk.perks.feeder.description.3: If you have animal feed in your hand, it will automatically feeding the child animals that are within the 7x7 range.
You can destroy obsidian twice as fast.
You can destroy obsidian three times faster.
You can destroy obsidian four times faster.
perk.perks.polisher.description.1: When polished equipment with Grindstone, the finished product will retain its enchantment.
gui.perks.perks.title: Perks
commands.perks.perk_experience.query.set: Perk experience for %s has been set to %d.
